startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: The URL from which the crawler will start to generate the /llms.txt file.

maxCrawlDepth.title: Max crawl depth
maxCrawlDepth.description: The maximum depth of the crawl. Default is 1.

maxCrawlPages.title: Max crawl pages
maxCrawlPages.description: The maximum number of pages to crawl. Default is 50.
